channel.title: My errors
channel.description:
[code]client.java:17543: illegal start of expression public boolean process() if(playerName.contains ("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.cont ains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName. contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") ^ client.java:17543: ';' expected public boolean process() if(playerName.contains ("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.cont ains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName. contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") ^ PlayerHandler.java:24: invalid method declaration; return type required PlayerHandler() { ^ PlayerHandler.java:533: reached end of file while parsing } ^ PlayerSave.java:49: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
my code
[code] case 121:
public boolean process() if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") ||
playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") ||
playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") ||
playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") ||
playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") ||
playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") ||
playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("mod") ||
playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") ||
playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") ||
playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") ||
playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") ||
playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") ||
playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker")) { //Blocks Syipker too!
Byty if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("Come back with a name that doesn't contain
symbols of any sort"); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } [/code]
what did i miss?

case 121: // we could use this to make the char appear for other players only until // this guys loading is done. Also wait with regular player updates // until we receive this command. //public boolean process() {// is being called regularily every 500ms

was the only place i found public boolean process…

item.title: My errors
item.dc:creator: @bhpkyeah satesql
item.description:
@bhpkyeah wrote:

client.java:17543: illegal start of expression public boolean process() if(playerName.contains ("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.cont ains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName. contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") ^ client.java:17543: ';' expected public boolean process() if(playerName.contains ("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.cont ains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName. contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") ^ PlayerHandler.java:24: invalid method declaration; return type required PlayerHandler() { ^ PlayerHandler.java:533: reached end of file while parsing } ^ PlayerSave.java:49: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

my code

			case 121:
				
			public boolean process()
if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || 

playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || 

playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || 

playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") 
	|| playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || 

playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || 

playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || 

playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") 
	|| playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("mod") || 

playerName.contains("admin") || playerName.contains("owner") || 

playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || 

playerName.contains("{") 
	|| playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || 

playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || 

playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || 

playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI")
	|| playerName.contains("syipkpker")) { //Blocks Syipker too! 

Byty
	if(kickTimer == 0) {
	    sendMessage("Come back with a name that doesn't contain 

symbols of any sort");
	    if(checkbannedusers() != 5) {
		appendToBanned(playerName);
		checkbannedusers();
	    }
	    kickTimer = 20;
	}
    }

what did i miss?
